citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
One female white goat kid was observed laying on the ground away from the other goats. Her face is wet with
discharge from the eyes and eyes are held closed. The entire surface of her left eye is white and cloudy. There is
discharge from her nose. Eye conditions such as this one can be expected to be painful and left untreated may
result in loss of the eye. This kid must be examined by a veterinarian to determine proper treatment. Correct By :
Close of business on 3/7/19
NOTE : Facility called the veterinarian immediately and exam is scheduled for 2 pm today.
The inspection was conducted with the maintenance manager and the exit discussion was conducted with the
facility president.

narrative:
